law.catch_line: The Council shall cooperate with other units of State government....

section.section: The Council shall cooperate with other units of State government.
The Council shall submit for approval each plan or project of the Council in which the State units have a statutory function or responsibility.

text.section:
The Council may:
cooperate with and provide planning assistance to local governments, instrumentalities, and planning units in the region; and
coordinate regional area planning with:
planning activities of the State and of the local governmental units, including special districts, in the region and neighboring areas; and
programs of the federal government.
